drops.name: Ensouled scorpion head
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/689153404288004097|quote=Fair few people asking about ensouled head drop rates... Here you go! [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CZBdXm_WUAIRceC.png:large]|date=18 January 2016}}

drops.name: Looting bag
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>{{CiteForum|author=Envision|url=https://archive.fo/5P5mn|title=Drop Rates V2|name=drop}}

drops.name: Mysterious emblem
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Mysterious emblems are only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/872520473749356549|date=7 June 2017|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/swS9N|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=It's calculated off the HP: 1 in (155 - (HP/2)) There's none with HP over 300, but it'd disregard values higher than that.}}

drops.name: Slayer's enchantment
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Slayer's enchantments are only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/973892117675298816|date=14 March 2018|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/CWYhV|archivedate=5 June 2019|quote=For nastier bosses (e.g. Callisto) it's 1/30. For other things it scales between 1/320 and 1/80 as the NPC's HP scales from 0 to 300.}}

drops.name: Larran's key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Larran's keys are only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref> {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1152237123778555904|date=19 July 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/lPWEG|archivedate=19 July 2019|quote=NPC combat levels 1-80: 1 in (100 + ((3 / 10) x (80 - level) x (80 - level))).}}
